alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Camden, south central Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Race Pond, or 9 miles northwest of Folkston, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Race Pond and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
